Paragraph: With all second - generation OCs as the reference , the odds ratios for VTE were 3 . 49 ( 1 . 21 - 10 . 12 ) for desogestrel plus 20 g ethinyloestradiol and 1 . 18 ( 0 . 66 - 2 . 17 ) for the other third - generation progestagens .

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

The other entities mentioned in the paragraph, "desogestrel" and "ethinyloestradiol," are not diseases, but rather medications used to prevent pregnancy. Therefore, they are not included in the list of disease entities.
